relevant_findings.general: delightful elderly male, sleeping comfortably, awakens easily to verbal stimuli, alert and interactive, comfortable, no acute distress
relevant_findings.HEENT: PERRL, anicteric, conjunctiva pink, oropharynx without lesion or exudate, moist mucus membranes, ears without lesions or apparent trauma
relevant_findings.CARDIOVASCULAR: Regular rate and rhythm without murmurs, rubs, or gallops
relevant_findings.LUNGS: clear to auscultation bilaterally without rhonchi, wheezes, or crackles
relevant_findings.GI: soft, TTP at RUQ and epigastrium, without rebounding or guarding, nondistended with normal active bowel sounds, no hepatomegaly
relevant_findings.SKIN: no rashes, petechia, lesions, or echymoses; warm to palpation
relevant_findings.NEURO: A&Ox3, able to recite months of the year forwards and backwards without error or delay, cranial nerves II-XII grossly intact, strength and sensation grossly intact
